articles.description: VINITA, Okla. (AP) — A northeast Oklahoma jury has convicted a former teacher of sexually abusing an 8-year-old student. The Tulsa World reports that the Craig County jury convicted 49-year-old Ronald Manners of one count of child sexual abuse. Manners was a …

articles.author: By Curtis Killman Tulsa World
articles.title: ICE deportee a 'poster child for leniency': Profile of a grand jury case in Tulsa
articles.description: An undocumented Guatemalan immigrant, arrested earlier this year after a collision in the rain, is among the people on jail immigration detainers brought in on minor complaints.

articles.author: NewsOn6.com
articles.title: Police Arrest Tulsa Juvenile For Murder, Armed Robbery And Sexual Assault - News On 6
articles.description: News On 6 Police Arrest Tulsa Juvenile For Murder, Armed Robbery And Sexual Assault News On 6 Police arrested 16-year-old juvenile after an armed robbery outside a Tulsa business late Sunday. Sgt. Dave Walker says Deonte Green is the same person who shot and …
